replies.message: that will never happen, lol.
They're the only 2 good rappers out there at the moment... Even all the up coming Artis have been turning into shit ...

there's plenty good artist out there. Cole is putting out heat, Kendrick is putting out heat. Kanye's got a new album coming. if you want to talk strictly wack, look up young thug jocking lil waynes shit lmao.

Seriously, I love Em and Hopsin, but to say they are the only two good rappers out there is fucking stupid. You must not listen to rap much then. Logic, Flawless, Passionate MC, Locksmith, VI Seconds, Kendrick Lamar, J Cole, Sky Jonez, Futuristic, Jarren Benton, Dizzy Wright, A-1, FinaL OutlaW, Tech N9ne, Jeff Turner, Chris Rivers....

I could go on even more.
Hopsin and Em would be so dope. Like look at this pic
I usually listen to the ones that are coming up like australian ones that haven't made it out, we have so much talent but the shit ones make it ...
Never hop is too dope
You guys are fuckin stupid for bringing up Cole and Kendrick. Get off the sack already. Fans praise them as if they invented rap.
eminem didnt either...
Hop already said he would be down if em was. Em is hopsins favorite rapper. Mgk also wanted to collab with em. Now that would be sick.
until mgk and hopsin get to the same independent level as tech n9ne, dont expect a collab anytime soon,

Nah I don't see any collabs with small independent artists anytime soon or at all in that matter. Em has so much to focus on right now, with slaughterhouse, shady records. Hell I read where yalawolf was getting kinda pissed cause Em was putting him on the back burner. There song "best friend", is pretty dope.
Hopsin retired, he doesn't rap anymore
^ lmao... It was a promotion for pound syndrome
Hop and eminem are the only good rappers that are putting out rap right now. All these other guys are a bunch of goofs.
If he's gonna drop a duo he needs to do it with Tupac you guys don't know hip hop
